

```{r}
outlier.RT <- data%>%
  group_by(Task,cost)%>%
  filter(abs(RT - mean(RT)) > (sd(RT) * 2.5))%>%
  select(1:5)

outlier.ER <- data%>%
  group_by(Task,cost)%>%
  filter(abs(ER - mean(ER)) > (sd(ER) * 2.5))%>%
  select(c(1:4,6))
```
